content: So Nanit has a network effect based on data. More users > more data about babies > better benchmark for parents > more users. Nexar is another computer vision company doing something similar with car dashcams. It hopes to make drivers safer by analysing video from the cars in the area and warns you about dangers before you see them. It has the same kind of data network effect and is also based in Israel. We call this approach a “data harvesting platform” in the Platform Hunt database.
